title: Lumpini Park Morning Market
description: Food is available until about 9am. Thai Chinese dishes, desserts and  drinks are made fresh every Tues-Fri. Directions to morning market in Lumpini Park: go in the park entrance on Rama IV road across from the HSBC and Abdul Rahim Buildings (there is also a bus stop there). Walk in and take the first right. Walk about 50 meters and the market will be on your right. There are a few vegetarian stalls on the back side. Signs are in Chinese and Thai, ask for "kin jeh" (vegetarian).
